Detailed Description

Performs matrix vector product.

This class multiplies a matrix by a vector, producing a vector, a la: [x1 x2 x3] [y1] [(x1*y1 + x2*y2 + x3*y3)] [x4 x5 x6] * [y2] = [(x4*y1 + x5*y2 + x6*y3)] [x7 x8 x9] [y3] [(x7*y1 + x8*y2 + x9*y3)]
